AI Risk Frameworks

The MIT AI Risk Repository presents a database and two taxonomies of AI risks compiled through a systematic search of existing frameworks, taxonomies, and classifications. This slide deck provides a holistic view of how AI risks are currently conceptualised, highlighting common themes and gaps in understanding.

Key Concepts:

  • Concept of AI risks
  • Common themes in AI risk frameworks
  • Gaps in understanding of AI risks
